title: Tagliatelle with cavolo nero, chickpeas and pecorino
description: Quick, easy and healthy. This pasta recipe is on the table in less than 20 minutes.Each serving provides 713kcal, 28g protein, 77g carbohydrate (of which 4.5g sugars), 31g fat (of which 8.5g saturates), 8g fibre and 0.5g salt.
ingredients: large handful cavolo nero, or kale
100g/3½oz pecorino or other hard cheese, finely grated
